gw.api.web

Class UnsavedWorkHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • gw.api.web.UnsavedWorkHelper

  • public class UnsavedWorkHelper
extends java.lang.Object
    A utility class that exposes methods to manipulate Unsaved Work entries in the UnsavedWork menu.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      UnsavedWorkHelper() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static boolean canGoToUnsavedWork(java.lang.String key)
      Check if an unsaved work location with given key exists.

      A utility method to clear all local Unsaved Work entries from the Unsaved Work menu.

      A utility method to clear an Unsaved Work entry for the given Destination.
      static void goToUnsavedWork(java.lang.String key)
      Go to an unsaved work location with given key or throw an exception if it cannot be found.
      static void goToUnsavedWorkGroup(java.lang.String key)
      Go to the location group for the unsaved work location with given key or throw an exception if it cannot be found.

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • UnsavedWorkHelper

        public UnsavedWorkHelper()

    • Method Detail

      • clearAllUnsavedWorkEntries

        public static void clearAllUnsavedWorkEntries()
        A utility method to clear all local Unsaved Work entries from the Unsaved Work menu. Usually this will clear all unsaved work, but in a multi cluster configuration it will not clear unsaved work on remote clusters.

        Warning: This throws away all local changes the User has made that have not yet been saved but are persisted as Unsaved Work; use with caution!

      • clearUnsavedWorkEntryForDestination

        public static void clearUnsavedWorkEntryForDestination(Destination destination)
        A utility method to clear an Unsaved Work entry for the given Destination. A Destination can be created by called {LocationName}.createDestination(...).

        Warning: This throws away all changes the User has made at the given Destination, use with care!

        Parameters:
        destination - the Destination to clear an Unsaved Work entry for.

      • goToUnsavedWork

        public static void goToUnsavedWork(java.lang.String key)
        Go to an unsaved work location with given key or throw an exception if it cannot be found.

      • goToUnsavedWorkGroup

        public static void goToUnsavedWorkGroup(java.lang.String key)
        Go to the location group for the unsaved work location with given key or throw an exception if it cannot be found.

      • canGoToUnsavedWork

        public static boolean canGoToUnsavedWork(java.lang.String key)
        Check if an unsaved work location with given key exists.
